                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">My face is but a moon, and clouded too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Blessed are clouds, to do as such clouds do!</div>
                     <div class="line">Vouchsafe, bright moon, and these thy stars, to shine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Those clouds removed, upon our watery eyne.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">O vain petitioner! beg a greater matter;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou now request'st but moonshine in the water.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, in our measure do but vouchsafe one change.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou bid'st me beg: this begging is not strange.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Play, music, then! Nay, you must do it soon.</div>
                     <p>Music plays</p>
                     <div class="line">Not yet! no dance! Thus change I like the moon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you not dance? How come you thus estranged?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">You took the moon at full, but now she's changed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet still she is the moon, and I the man.</div>
                     <div class="line">The music plays; vouchsafe some motion to it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Our ears vouchsafe it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">But your legs should do it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Since you are strangers and come here by chance,</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll not be nice: take hands. We will not dance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Why take we hands, then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Only to part friends:</div>
                     <div class="line">Curtsy, sweet hearts; and so the measure ends.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">More measure of this measure; be not nice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">We can afford no more at such a price.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Prize you yourselves: what buys your company?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Your absence only.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">That can never be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Then cannot we be bought: and so, adieu;</div>
                     <div class="line">Twice to your visor, and half once to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">If you deny to dance, let's hold more chat.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">In private, then.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I am best pleased with that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They converse apart</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">White-handed mistress, one sweet word with thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Honey, and milk, and sugar; there is three.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay then, two treys, and if you grow so nice,</div>
                     <div class="line">Metheglin, wort, and malmsey: well run, dice!</div>
                     <div class="line">There's half-a-dozen sweets.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Seventh sweet, adieu:</div>
                     <div class="line">Since you can cog, I'll play no more with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">One word in secret.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it not be sweet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou grievest my gall.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Gall! bitter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore meet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They converse apart</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you vouchsafe with me to change a word?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Name it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair lady,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Say you so? Fair lord,--</div>
                     <div class="line">Take that for your fair lady.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">Please it you,</div>
                     <div class="line">As much in private, and I'll bid adieu.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They converse apart</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">What, was your vizard made without a tongue?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">I know the reason, lady, why you ask.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">O for your reason! quickly, sir; I long.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">You have a double tongue within your mask,</div>
                     <div class="line">And would afford my speechless vizard half.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Veal, quoth the Dutchman. Is not 'veal' a calf?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">A calf, fair lady!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, a fair lord calf.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's part the word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">No, I'll not be your half</div>
                     <div class="line">Take all, and wean it; it may prove an ox.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">Look, how you butt yourself in these sharp mocks!</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you give horns, chaste lady? do not so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Then die a calf, before your horns do grow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">One word in private with you, ere I die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Bleat softly then; the butcher hears you cry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They converse apart</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">The tongues of mocking wenches are as keen</div>
                     <div class="line">As is the razor's edge invisible,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cutting a smaller hair than may be seen,</div>
                     <div class="line">Above the sense of sense; so sensible</div>
                     <div class="line">Seemeth their conference; their conceits have wings</div>
                     <div class="line">Fleeter than arrows, bullets, wind, thought, swifter things.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Not one word more, my maids; break off, break off.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, all dry-beaten with pure scoff!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell, mad wenches; you have simple wits.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Twenty adieus, my frozen Muscovits.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt FERDINAND, Lords, and Blackamoors</p>
                     <div class="line">Are these the breed of wits so wonder'd at?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Tapers they are, with your sweet breaths puff'd out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well-liking wits they have; gross, gross; fat, fat.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">O poverty in wit, kingly-poor flout!</div>
                     <div class="line">Will they not, think you, hang themselves tonight?</div>
                     <div class="line">Or ever, but in vizards, show their faces?</div>
                     <div class="line">This pert Biron was out of countenance quite.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">O, they were all in lamentable cases!</div>
                     <div class="line">The king was weeping-ripe for a good word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Biron did swear himself out of all suit.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Dumain was at my service, and his sword:</div>
                     <div class="line">No point, quoth I; my servant straight was mute.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Lord Longaville said, I came o'er his heart;</div>
                     <div class="line">And trow you what he called me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Qualm, perhaps.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, in good faith.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go, sickness as thou art!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, better wits have worn plain statute-caps.</div>
                     <div class="line">But will you hear? the king is my love sworn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">And quick Biron hath plighted faith to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                     <div class="line">And Longaville was for my service born.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Dumain is mine, as sure as bark on tree.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, and pretty mistresses, give ear:</div>
                     <div class="line">Immediately they will again be here</div>
                     <div class="line">In their own shapes; for it can never be</div>
                     <div class="line">They will digest this harsh indignity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Will they return?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">They will, they will, God knows,</div>
                     <div class="line">And leap for joy, though they are lame with blows:</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore change favours; and, when they repair,</div>
                     <div class="line">Blow like sweet roses in this summer air.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">How blow? how blow? speak to be understood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair ladies mask'd are roses in their bud;</div>
                     <div class="line">Dismask'd, their damask sweet commixture shown,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are angels vailing clouds, or roses blown.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Avaunt, perplexity! What shall we do,</div>
                     <div class="line">If they return in their own shapes to woo?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Good madam, if by me you'll be advised,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's, mock them still, as well known as disguised:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us complain to them what fools were here,</div>
                     <div class="line">Disguised like Muscovites, in shapeless gear;</div>
                     <div class="line">And wonder what they were and to what end</div>
                     <div class="line">Their shallow shows and prologue vilely penn'd</div>
                     <div class="line">And their rough carriage so ridiculous,</div>
                     <div class="line">Should be presented at our tent to us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Ladies, withdraw: the gallants are at hand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Whip to our tents, as roes run o'er land.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt PRINCESS, ROSALINE, KATHARINE, and MARIA</p>
               <p>Re-enter FERDINAND, BIRON, LONGAVILLE, and DUMAIN,
in their proper habits</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair sir, God save you! Where's the princess?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Gone to her tent. Please it your majesty</div>
                     <div class="line">Command me any service to her thither?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">That she vouchsafe me audience for one word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">I will; and so will she, I know, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">This fellow pecks up wit as pigeons pease,</div>
                     <div class="line">And utters it again when God doth please:</div>
                     <div class="line">He is wit's pedler, and retails his wares</div>
                     <div class="line">At wakes and wassails, meetings, markets, fairs;</div>
                     <div class="line">And we that sell by gross, the Lord doth know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have not the grace to grace it with such show.</div>
                     <div class="line">This gallant pins the wenches on his sleeve;</div>
                     <div class="line">Had he been Adam, he had tempted Eve;</div>
                     <div class="line">A' can carve too, and lisp: why, this is he</div>
                     <div class="line">That kiss'd his hand away in courtesy;</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the ape of form, monsieur the nice,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, when he plays at tables, chides the dice</div>
                     <div class="line">In honourable terms: nay, he can sing</div>
                     <div class="line">A mean most meanly; and in ushering</div>
                     <div class="line">Mend him who can: the ladies call him sweet;</div>
                     <div class="line">The stairs, as he treads on them, kiss his feet:</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the flower that smiles on every one,</div>
                     <div class="line">To show his teeth as white as whale's bone;</div>
                     <div class="line">And consciences, that will not die in debt,</div>
                     <div class="line">Pay him the due of honey-tongued Boyet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">A blister on his sweet tongue, with my heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">That put Armado's page out of his part!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">See where it comes! Behavior, what wert thou</div>
                     <div class="line">Till this madman show'd thee? and what art thou now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter the PRINCESS, ushered by BOYET, ROSALINE,
MARIA, and KATHARINE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">All hail, sweet madam, and fair time of day!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">'Fair' in 'all hail' is foul, as I conceive.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Construe my speeches better, if you may.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Then wish me better; I will give you leave.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">We came to visit you, and purpose now</div>
                     <div class="line">To lead you to our court; vouchsafe it then.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">This field shall hold me; and so hold your vow:</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor God, nor I, delights in perjured men.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Rebuke me not for that which you provoke:</div>
                     <div class="line">The virtue of your eye must break my oath.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">You nickname virtue; vice you should have spoke;</div>
                     <div class="line">For virtue's office never breaks men's troth.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now by my maiden honour, yet as pure</div>
                     <div class="line">As the unsullied lily, I protest,</div>
                     <div class="line">A world of torments though I should endure,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not yield to be your house's guest;</div>
                     <div class="line">So much I hate a breaking cause to be</div>
                     <div class="line">Of heavenly oaths, vow'd with integrity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">O, you have lived in desolation here,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unseen, unvisited, much to our shame.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so, my lord; it is not so, I swear;</div>
                     <div class="line">We have had pastimes here and pleasant game:</div>
                     <div class="line">A mess of Russians left us but of late.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">How, madam! Russians!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, in truth, my lord;</div>
                     <div class="line">Trim gallants, full of courtship and of state.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, speak true. It is not so, my lord:</div>
                     <div class="line">My lady, to the manner of the days,</div>
                     <div class="line">In courtesy gives undeserving praise.</div>
                     <div class="line">We four indeed confronted were with four</div>
                     <div class="line">In Russian habit: here they stay'd an hour,</div>
                     <div class="line">And talk'd apace; and in that hour, my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">They did not bless us with one happy word.</div>
                     <div class="line">I dare not call them fools; but this I think,</div>
                     <div class="line">When they are thirsty, fools would fain have drink.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">This jest is dry to me. Fair gentle sweet,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your wit makes wise things foolish: when we greet,</div>
                     <div class="line">With eyes best seeing, heaven's fiery eye,</div>
                     <div class="line">By light we lose light: your capacity</div>
                     <div class="line">Is of that nature that to your huge store</div>
                     <div class="line">Wise things seem foolish and rich things but poor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">This proves you wise and rich, for in my eye,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a fool, and full of poverty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">But that you take what doth to you belong,</div>
                     <div class="line">It were a fault to snatch words from my tongue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">O, I am yours, and all that I possess!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">All the fool mine?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot give you less.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Which of the vizards was it that you wore?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Where? when? what vizard? why demand you this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">There, then, that vizard; that superfluous case</div>
                     <div class="line">That hid the worse and show'd the better face.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">We are descried; they'll mock us now downright.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us confess and turn it to a jest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Amazed, my lord? why looks your highness sad?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Help, hold his brows! he'll swoon! Why look you pale?</div>
                     <div class="line">Sea-sick, I think, coming from Muscovy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus pour the stars down plagues for perjury.</div>
                     <div class="line">Can any face of brass hold longer out?</div>
                     <div class="line">Here stand I lady, dart thy skill at me;</div>
                     <div class="line">Bruise me with scorn, confound me with a flout;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thrust thy sharp wit quite through my ignorance;</div>
                     <div class="line">Cut me to pieces with thy keen conceit;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will wish thee never more to dance,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor never more in Russian habit wait.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, never will I trust to speeches penn'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor to the motion of a schoolboy's tongue,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor never come in vizard to my friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor woo in rhyme, like a blind harper's song!</div>
                     <div class="line">Taffeta phrases, silken terms precise,</div>
                     <div class="line">Three-piled hyperboles, spruce affectation,</div>
                     <div class="line">Figures pedantical; these summer-flies</div>
                     <div class="line">Have blown me full of maggot ostentation:</div>
                     <div class="line">I do forswear them; and I here protest,</div>
                     <div class="line">By this white glove;--how white the hand, God knows!--</div>
                     <div class="line">Henceforth my wooing mind shall be express'd</div>
                     <div class="line">In russet yeas and honest kersey noes:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, to begin, wench,--so God help me, la!--</div>
                     <div class="line">My love to thee is sound, sans crack or flaw.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Sans sans, I pray you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet I have a trick</div>
                     <div class="line">Of the old rage: bear with me, I am sick;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll leave it by degrees. Soft, let us see:</div>
                     <div class="line">Write, 'Lord have mercy on us' on those three;</div>
                     <div class="line">They are infected; in their hearts it lies;</div>
                     <div class="line">They have the plague, and caught it of your eyes;</div>
                     <div class="line">These lords are visited; you are not free,</div>
                     <div class="line">For the Lord's tokens on you do I see.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">No, they are free that gave these tokens to us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Our states are forfeit: seek not to undo us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">It is not so; for how can this be true,</div>
                     <div class="line">That you stand forfeit, being those that sue?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace! for I will not have to do with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor shall not, if I do as I intend.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Speak for yourselves; my wit is at an end.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Teach us, sweet madam, for our rude transgression</div>
                     <div class="line">Some fair excuse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">The fairest is confession.</div>
                     <div class="line">Were not you here but even now disguised?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, I was.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">And were you well advised?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I was, fair madam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">When you then were here,</div>
                     <div class="line">What did you whisper in your lady's ear?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">That more than all the world I did respect her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">When she shall challenge this, you will reject her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon mine honour, no.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, peace! forbear:</div>
                     <div class="line">Your oath once broke, you force not to forswear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Despise me, when I break this oath of mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">I will: and therefore keep it. Rosaline,</div>
                     <div class="line">What did the Russian whisper in your ear?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, he swore that he did hold me dear</div>
                     <div class="line">As precious eyesight, and did value me</div>
                     <div class="line">Above this world; adding thereto moreover</div>
                     <div class="line">That he would wed me, or else die my lover.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">God give thee joy of him! the noble lord</div>
                     <div class="line">Most honourably doth unhold his word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">What mean you, madam? by my life, my troth,</div>
                     <div class="line">I never swore this lady such an oath.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, you did; and to confirm it plain,</div>
                     <div class="line">You gave me this: but take it, sir, again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">My faith and this the princess I did give:</div>
                     <div class="line">I knew her by this jewel on her sleeve.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon me, sir, this jewel did she wear;</div>
                     <div class="line">And Lord Biron, I thank him, is my dear.</div>
                     <div class="line">What, will you have me, or your pearl again?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Neither of either; I remit both twain.</div>
                     <div class="line">I see the trick on't: here was a consent,</div>
                     <div class="line">Knowing aforehand of our merriment,</div>
                     <div class="line">To dash it like a Christmas comedy:</div>
                     <div class="line">Some carry-tale, some please-man, some slight zany,</div>
                     <div class="line">Some mumble-news, some trencher-knight, some Dick,</div>
                     <div class="line">That smiles his cheek in years and knows the trick</div>
                     <div class="line">To make my lady laugh when she's disposed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Told our intents before; which once disclosed,</div>
                     <div class="line">The ladies did change favours: and then we,</div>
                     <div class="line">Following the signs, woo'd but the sign of she.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, to our perjury to add more terror,</div>
                     <div class="line">We are again forsworn, in will and error.</div>
                     <div class="line">Much upon this it is: and might not you</div>
                     <p>To BOYET</p>
                     <div class="line">Forestall our sport, to make us thus untrue?</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not you know my lady's foot by the squier,</div>
                     <div class="line">And laugh upon the apple of her eye?</div>
                     <div class="line">And stand between her back, sir, and the fire,</div>
                     <div class="line">Holding a trencher, jesting merrily?</div>
                     <div class="line">You put our page out: go, you are allow'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Die when you will, a smock shall be your shroud.</div>
                     <div class="line">You leer upon me, do you? there's an eye</div>
                     <div class="line">Wounds like a leaden sword.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Full merrily</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath this brave manage, this career, been run.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Lo, he is tilting straight! Peace! I have done.</div>
                     <p>Enter COSTARD</p>
                     <div class="line">Welcome, pure wit! thou partest a fair fray.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">O Lord, sir, they would know</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether the three Worthies shall come in or no.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">What, are there but three?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">No, sir; but it is vara fine,</div>
                     <div class="line">For every one pursents three.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">And three times thrice is nine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so, sir; under correction, sir; I hope it is not so.</div>
                     <div class="line">You cannot beg us, sir, I can assure you, sir we know</div>
                     <div class="line">what we know:</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope, sir, three times thrice, sir,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Is not nine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Under correction, sir, we know whereuntil it doth amount.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">By Jove, I always took three threes for nine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">O Lord, sir, it were pity you should get your living</div>
                     <div class="line">by reckoning, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">How much is it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">O Lord, sir, the parties themselves, the actors,</div>
                     <div class="line">sir, will show whereuntil it doth amount: for mine</div>
                     <div class="line">own part, I am, as they say, but to parfect one man</div>
                     <div class="line">in one poor man, Pompion the Great, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Art thou one of the Worthies?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">It pleased them to think me worthy of Pompion the</div>
                     <div class="line">Great: for mine own part, I know not the degree of</div>
                     <div class="line">the Worthy, but I am to stand for him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Go, bid them prepare.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">We will turn it finely off, sir; we will take</div>
                     <div class="line">some care.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Biron, they will shame us: let them not approach.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">We are shame-proof, my lord: and tis some policy</div>
                     <div class="line">To have one show worse than the king's and his company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I say they shall not come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, my good lord, let me o'errule you now:</div>
                     <div class="line">That sport best pleases that doth least know how:</div>
                     <div class="line">Where zeal strives to content, and the contents</div>
                     <div class="line">Dies in the zeal of that which it presents:</div>
                     <div class="line">Their form confounded makes most form in mirth,</div>
                     <div class="line">When great things labouring perish in their birth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">A right description of our sport, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                     <div class="line">Anointed, I implore so much expense of thy royal</div>
                     <div class="line">sweet breath as will utter a brace of words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Converses apart with FERDINAND, and delivers him a paper</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth this man serve God?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Why ask you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">He speaks not like a man of God's making.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                     <div class="line">That is all one, my fair, sweet, honey monarch; for,</div>
                     <div class="line">I protest, the schoolmaster is exceeding</div>
                     <div class="line">fantastical; too, too vain, too too vain: but we</div>
                     <div class="line">will put it, as they say, to fortuna de la guerra.</div>
                     <div class="line">I wish you the peace of mind, most royal couplement!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is like to be a good presence of Worthies. He</div>
                     <div class="line">presents Hector of Troy; the swain, Pompey the</div>
                     <div class="line">Great; the parish curate, Alexander; Armado's page,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hercules; the pedant, Judas Maccabaeus: And if</div>
                     <div class="line">these four Worthies in their first show thrive,</div>
                     <div class="line">These four will change habits, and present the other five.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">There is five in the first show.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">You are deceived; 'tis not so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">The pedant, the braggart, the hedge-priest, the fool</div>
                     <div class="line">and the boy:--</div>
                     <div class="line">Abate throw at novum, and the whole world again</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot pick out five such, take each one in his vein.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">The ship is under sail, and here she comes amain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter COSTARD, for Pompey</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">I Pompey am,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">You lie, you are not he.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">I Pompey am,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">With libbard's head on knee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Well said, old mocker: I must needs be friends</div>
                     <div class="line">with thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">I Pompey am, Pompey surnamed the Big--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">The Great.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">It is, 'Great,' sir:--</div>
                     <div class="line">Pompey surnamed the Great;</div>
                     <div class="line">That oft in field, with targe and shield, did make</div>
                     <div class="line">my foe to sweat:</div>
                     <div class="line">And travelling along this coast, I here am come by chance,</div>
                     <div class="line">And lay my arms before the legs of this sweet lass of France,</div>
                     <div class="line">If your ladyship would say, 'Thanks, Pompey,' I had done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">Great thanks, great Pompey.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis not so much worth; but I hope I was perfect: I</div>
                     <div class="line">made a little fault in 'Great.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">My hat to a halfpenny, Pompey proves the best Worthy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SIR NATHANIEL, for Alexander</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR NATHANIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">When in the world I lived, I was the world's</div>
                     <div class="line">commander;</div>
                     <div class="line">By east, west, north, and south, I spread my</div>
                     <div class="line">conquering might:</div>
                     <div class="line">My scutcheon plain declares that I am Alisander,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Your nose says, no, you are not for it stands too right.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Your nose smells 'no' in this, most tender-smelling knight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                     <div class="line">The conqueror is dismay'd. Proceed, good Alexander.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR NATHANIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">When in the world I lived, I was the world's</div>
                     <div class="line">commander,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Most true, 'tis right; you were so, Alisander.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Pompey the Great,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Your servant, and Costard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Take away the conqueror, take away Alisander.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To SIR NATHANIEL</span>  O, sir, you have overthrown</div>
                     <div class="line">Alisander the conqueror! You will be scraped out of</div>
                     <div class="line">the painted cloth for this: your lion, that holds</div>
                     <div class="line">his poll-axe sitting on a close-stool, will be given</div>
                     <div class="line">to Ajax: he will be the ninth Worthy. A conqueror,</div>
                     <div class="line">and afeard to speak! run away for shame, Alisander.</div>
                     <p>SIR NATHANIEL retires</p>
                     <div class="line">There, an't shall please you; a foolish mild man; an</div>
                     <div class="line">honest man, look you, and soon dashed. He is a</div>
                     <div class="line">marvellous good neighbour, faith, and a very good</div>
                     <div class="line">bowler: but, for Alisander,--alas, you see how</div>
                     <div class="line">'tis,--a little o'erparted. But there are Worthies</div>
                     <div class="line">a-coming will speak their mind in some other sort.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter HOLOFERNES, for Judas; and MOTH, for Hercules</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">Great Hercules is presented by this imp,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose club kill'd Cerberus, that three-headed canis;</div>
                     <div class="line">And when he was a babe, a child, a shrimp,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus did he strangle serpents in his manus.</div>
                     <div class="line">Quoniam he seemeth in minority,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ergo I come with this apology.</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep some state in thy exit, and vanish.</div>
                     <p>MOTH retires</p>
                     <div class="line">Judas I am,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">A Judas!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">Not Iscariot, sir.</div>
                     <div class="line">Judas I am, ycliped Maccabaeus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">Judas Maccabaeus clipt is plain Judas.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">A kissing traitor. How art thou proved Judas?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">Judas I am,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">The more shame for you, Judas.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">What mean you, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">To make Judas hang himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">Begin, sir; you are my elder.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Well followed: Judas was hanged on an elder.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not be put out of countenance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Because thou hast no face.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">What is this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">A cittern-head.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">The head of a bodkin.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">A Death's face in a ring.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                     <div class="line">The face of an old Roman coin, scarce seen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">The pommel of Caesar's falchion.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">The carved-bone face on a flask.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Saint George's half-cheek in a brooch.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and in a brooch of lead.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and worn in the cap of a tooth-drawer.</div>
                     <div class="line">And now forward; for we have put thee in countenance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">You have put me out of countenance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">False; we have given thee faces.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                     <div class="line">But you have out-faced them all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                     <div class="line">An thou wert a lion, we would do so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore, as he is an ass, let him go.</div>
                     <div class="line">And so adieu, sweet Jude! nay, why dost thou stay?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                     <div class="line">For the latter end of his name.</div>
                  </div>
