                              <div class="line">How low soever the matter, I hope in God for high words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">A high hope for a low heaven: God grant us patience!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear? or forbear laughing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear meekly, sir, and to laugh moderately; or to</div>
                              <div class="line">forbear both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, be it as the style shall give us cause to</div>
                              <div class="line">climb in the merriness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">The matter is to me, sir, as concerning Jaquenetta.</div>
                              <div class="line">The manner of it is, I was taken with the manner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">In what manner?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">In manner and form following, sir; all those three:</div>
                              <div class="line">I was seen with her in the manor-house, sitting with</div>
                              <div class="line">her upon the form, and taken following her into the</div>
                              <div class="line">park; which, put together, is in manner and form</div>
                              <div class="line">following. Now, sir, for the manner,--it is the</div>
                              <div class="line">manner of a man to speak to a woman: for the form,--</div>
                              <div class="line">in some form.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">For the following, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">As it shall follow in my correction: and God defend</div>
                              <div class="line">the right!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you hear this letter with attention?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">As we would hear an oracle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Such is the simplicity of man to hearken after the flesh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'Great deputy, the welkin's vicegerent and</div>
                              <div class="line">sole dominator of Navarre, my soul's earth's god,</div>
                              <div class="line">and body's fostering patron.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a word of Costard yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'So it is,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">It may be so: but if he say it is so, he is, in</div>
                              <div class="line">telling true, but so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Be to me and every man that dares not fight!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">No words!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Of other men's secrets, I beseech you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'So it is, besieged with sable-coloured</div>
                              <div class="line">melancholy, I did commend the black-oppressing humour</div>
                              <div class="line">to the most wholesome physic of thy health-giving</div>
                              <div class="line">air; and, as I am a gentleman, betook myself to</div>
                              <div class="line">walk. The time when. About the sixth hour; when</div>
                              <div class="line">beasts most graze, birds best peck, and men sit down</div>
                              <div class="line">to that nourishment which is called supper: so much</div>
                              <div class="line">for the time when. Now for the ground which; which,</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, I walked upon: it is y-cleped thy park. Then</div>
                              <div class="line">for the place where; where, I mean, I did encounter</div>
                              <div class="line">that obscene and preposterous event, that draweth</div>
                              <div class="line">from my snow-white pen the ebon-coloured ink, which</div>
                              <div class="line">here thou viewest, beholdest, surveyest, or seest;</div>
                              <div class="line">but to the place where; it standeth north-north-east</div>
                              <div class="line">and by east from the west corner of thy curious-</div>
                              <div class="line">knotted garden: there did I see that low-spirited</div>
                              <div class="line">swain, that base minnow of thy mirth,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'that unlettered small-knowing soul,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'that shallow vassal,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Still me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'which, as I remember, hight Costard,'--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">O, me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'sorted and consorted, contrary to thy</div>
                              <div class="line">established proclaimed edict and continent canon,</div>
                              <div class="line">which with,--O, with--but with this I passion to say</div>
                              <div class="line">wherewith,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">With a wench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'with a child of our grandmother Eve, a</div>
                              <div class="line">female; or, for thy more sweet understanding, a</div>
                              <div class="line">woman. Him I, as my ever-esteemed duty pricks me on,</div>
                              <div class="line">have sent to thee, to receive the meed of</div>
                              <div class="line">punishment, by thy sweet grace's officer, Anthony</div>
                              <div class="line">Dull; a man of good repute, carriage, bearing, and</div>
                              <div class="line">estimation.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DULL</div>
                              <div class="line">'Me, an't shall please you; I am Anthony Dull.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'For Jaquenetta,--so is the weaker vessel</div>
                              <div class="line">called which I apprehended with the aforesaid</div>
                              <div class="line">swain,--I keep her as a vessel of the law's fury;</div>
                              <div class="line">and shall, at the least of thy sweet notice, bring</div>
                              <div class="line">her to trial. Thine, in all compliments of devoted</div>
                              <div class="line">and heart-burning heat of duty.</div>
                              <div class="line">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">This is not so well as I looked for, but the best</div>
                              <div class="line">that ever I heard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, the best for the worst. But, sirrah, what say</div>
                              <div class="line">you to this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I confess the wench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you hear the proclamation?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I do confess much of the hearing it but little of</div>
                              <div class="line">the marking of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">It was proclaimed a year's imprisonment, to be taken</div>
                              <div class="line">with a wench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I was taken with none, sir: I was taken with a damsel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, it was proclaimed 'damsel.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">This was no damsel, neither, sir; she was a virgin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">It is so varied, too; for it was proclaimed 'virgin.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">If it were, I deny her virginity: I was taken with a maid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">This maid will not serve your turn, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">This maid will serve my turn, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I will pronounce your sentence: you shall fast</div>
                              <div class="line">a week with bran and water.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather pray a month with mutton and porridge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">And Don Armado shall be your keeper.</div>
                              <div class="line">My Lord Biron, see him deliver'd o'er:</div>
                              <div class="line">And go we, lords, to put in practise that</div>
                              <div class="line">Which each to other hath so strongly sworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt FERDINAND, LONGAVILLE, and DUMAIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll lay my head to any good man's hat,</div>
                              <div class="line">These oaths and laws will prove an idle scorn.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, come on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I suffer for the truth, sir; for true it is, I was</div>
                              <div class="line">taken with Jaquenetta, and Jaquenetta is a true</div>
                              <div class="line">girl; and therefore welcome the sour cup of</div>
                              <div class="line">prosperity! Affliction may one day smile again; and</div>
                              <div class="line">till then, sit thee down, sorrow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO and MOTH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Boy, what sign is it when a man of great spirit</div>
                              <div class="line">grows melancholy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">A great sign, sir, that he will look sad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sadness is one and the self-same thing, dear imp.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no; O Lord, sir, no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">How canst thou part sadness and melancholy, my</div>
                              <div class="line">tender juvenal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">By a familiar demonstration of the working, my tough senior.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why tough senior? why tough senior?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why tender juvenal? why tender juvenal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I spoke it, tender juvenal, as a congruent epitheton</div>
                              <div class="line">appertaining to thy young days, which we may</div>
                              <div class="line">nominate tender.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, tough senior, as an appertinent title to your</div>
                              <div class="line">old time, which we may name tough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pretty and apt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">How mean you, sir? I pretty, and my saying apt? or</div>
                              <div class="line">I apt, and my saying pretty?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou pretty, because little.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Little pretty, because little. Wherefore apt?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore apt, because quick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak you this in my praise, master?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">In thy condign praise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">I will praise an eel with the same praise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, that an eel is ingenious?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">That an eel is quick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do say thou art quick in answers: thou heatest my blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">I am answered, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I love not to be crossed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  He speaks the mere contrary; crosses love not him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have promised to study three years with the duke.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">You may do it in an hour, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Impossible.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">How many is one thrice told?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am ill at reckoning; it fitteth the spirit of a tapster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">You are a gentleman and a gamester, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I confess both: they are both the varnish of a</div>
                              <div class="line">complete man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, I am sure, you know how much the gross sum of</div>
                              <div class="line">deuce-ace amounts to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">It doth amount to one more than two.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Which the base vulgar do call three.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">True.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, is this such a piece of study? Now here</div>
                              <div class="line">is three studied, ere ye'll thrice wink: and how</div>
                              <div class="line">easy it is to put 'years' to the word 'three,' and</div>
                              <div class="line">study three years in two words, the dancing horse</div>
                              <div class="line">will tell you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">A most fine figure!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">To prove you a cipher.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will hereupon confess I am in love: and as it is</div>
                              <div class="line">base for a soldier to love, so am I in love with a</div>
                              <div class="line">base wench. If drawing my sword against the humour</div>
                              <div class="line">of affection would deliver me from the reprobate</div>
                              <div class="line">thought of it, I would take Desire prisoner, and</div>
                              <div class="line">ransom him to any French courtier for a new-devised</div>
                              <div class="line">courtesy. I think scorn to sigh: methinks I should</div>
                              <div class="line">outswear Cupid. Comfort, me, boy: what great men</div>
                              <div class="line">have been in love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Hercules, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most sweet Hercules! More authority, dear boy, name</div>
                              <div class="line">more; and, sweet my child, let them be men of good</div>
                              <div class="line">repute and carriage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Samson, master: he was a man of good carriage, great</div>
                              <div class="line">carriage, for he carried the town-gates on his back</div>
                              <div class="line">like a porter: and he was in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">O well-knit Samson! strong-jointed Samson! I do</div>
                              <div class="line">excel thee in my rapier as much as thou didst me in</div>
                              <div class="line">carrying gates. I am in love too. Who was Samson's</div>
                              <div class="line">love, my dear Moth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what complexion?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all the four, or the three, or the two, or one of the four.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me precisely of what complexion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the sea-water green, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is that one of the four complexions?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">As I have read, sir; and the best of them too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Green indeed is the colour of lovers; but to have a</div>
                              <div class="line">love of that colour, methinks Samson had small reason</div>
                              <div class="line">for it. He surely affected her for her wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">It was so, sir; for she had a green wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">My love is most immaculate white and red.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Most maculate thoughts, master, are masked under</div>
                              <div class="line">such colours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Define, define, well-educated infant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">My father's wit and my mother's tongue, assist me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet invocation of a child; most pretty and</div>
                              <div class="line">pathetical!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be made of white and red,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her faults will ne'er be known,</div>
                              <div class="line">For blushing cheeks by faults are bred</div>
                              <div class="line">And fears by pale white shown:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then if she fear, or be to blame,</div>
                              <div class="line">By this you shall not know,</div>
                              <div class="line">For still her cheeks possess the same</div>
                              <div class="line">Which native she doth owe.</div>
                              <div class="line">A dangerous rhyme, master, against the reason of</div>
                              <div class="line">white and red.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there not a ballad, boy, of the King and the Beggar?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">The world was very guilty of such a ballad some</div>
                              <div class="line">three ages since: but I think now 'tis not to be</div>
                              <div class="line">found; or, if it were, it would neither serve for</div>
                              <div class="line">the writing nor the tune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will have that subject newly writ o'er, that I may</div>
                              <div class="line">example my digression by some mighty precedent.</div>
                              <div class="line">Boy, I do love that country girl that I took in the</div>
                              <div class="line">park with the rational hind Costard: she deserves well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  To be whipped; and yet a better love than</div>
                              <div class="line">my master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing, boy; my spirit grows heavy in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">And that's great marvel, loving a light wench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, sing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Forbear till this company be past.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DULL, COSTARD, and JAQUENETTA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DULL</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, the duke's pleasure is, that you keep Costard</div>
                              <div class="line">safe: and you must suffer him to take no delight</div>
                              <div class="line">nor no penance; but a' must fast three days a week.</div>
                              <div class="line">For this damsel, I must keep her at the park: she</div>
                              <div class="line">is allowed for the day-woman. Fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do betray myself with blushing. Maid!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JAQUENETTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will visit thee at the lodge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JAQUENETTA</div>
                              <div class="line">That's hereby.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know where it is situate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JAQUENETTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, how wise you are!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will tell thee wonders.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JAQUENETTA</div>
                              <div class="line">With that face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JAQUENETTA</div>
                              <div class="line">So I heard you say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JAQUENETTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair weather after you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DULL</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Jaquenetta, away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DULL and JAQUENETTA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Villain, thou shalt fast for thy offences ere thou</div>
                              <div class="line">be pardoned.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, I hope, when I do it, I shall do it on a</div>
                              <div class="line">full stomach.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shalt be heavily punished.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I am more bound to you than your fellows, for they</div>
                              <div class="line">are but lightly rewarded.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Take away this villain; shut him up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, you transgressing slave; away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me not be pent up, sir: I will fast, being loose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sir; that were fast and loose: thou shalt to prison.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, if ever I do see the merry days of desolation</div>
                              <div class="line">that I have seen, some shall see.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall some see?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, nothing, Master Moth, but what they look upon.</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not for prisoners to be too silent in their</div>
                              <div class="line">words; and therefore I will say nothing: I thank</div>
                              <div class="line">God I have as little patience as another man; and</div>
                              <div class="line">therefore I can be quiet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt MOTH and COSTARD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do affect the very ground, which is base, where</div>
                              <div class="line">her shoe, which is baser, guided by her foot, which</div>
                              <div class="line">is basest, doth tread. I shall be forsworn, which</div>
                              <div class="line">is a great argument of falsehood, if I love. And</div>
                              <div class="line">how can that be true love which is falsely</div>
                              <div class="line">attempted? Love is a familiar; Love is a devil:</div>
                              <div class="line">there is no evil angel but Love. Yet was Samson so</div>
                              <div class="line">tempted, and he had an excellent strength; yet was</div>
                              <div class="line">Solomon so seduced, and he had a very good wit.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cupid's butt-shaft is too hard for Hercules' club;</div>
                              <div class="line">and therefore too much odds for a Spaniard's rapier.</div>
                              <div class="line">The first and second cause will not serve my turn;</div>
                              <div class="line">the passado he respects not, the duello he regards</div>
                              <div class="line">not: his disgrace is to be called boy; but his</div>
                              <div class="line">glory is to subdue men. Adieu, valour! rust rapier!</div>
                              <div class="line">be still, drum! for your manager is in love; yea,</div>
                              <div class="line">he loveth. Assist me, some extemporal god of rhyme,</div>
                              <div class="line">for I am sure I shall turn sonnet. Devise, wit;</div>
                              <div class="line">write, pen; for I am for whole volumes in folio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  The same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter the PRINCESS of France, ROSALINE, MARIA,
KATHARINE, BOYET, Lords, and other Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, madam, summon up your dearest spirits:</div>
                              <div class="line">Consider who the king your father sends,</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom he sends, and what's his embassy:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yourself, held precious in the world's esteem,</div>
                              <div class="line">To parley with the sole inheritor</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all perfections that a man may owe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Matchless Navarre; the plea of no less weight</div>
                              <div class="line">Than Aquitaine, a dowry for a queen.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be now as prodigal of all dear grace</div>
                              <div class="line">As Nature was in making graces dear</div>
                              <div class="line">When she did starve the general world beside</div>
                              <div class="line">And prodigally gave them all to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Lord Boyet, my beauty, though but mean,</div>
                              <div class="line">Needs not the painted flourish of your praise:</div>
                              <div class="line">Beauty is bought by judgement of the eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not utter'd by base sale of chapmen's tongues:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am less proud to hear you tell my worth</div>
                              <div class="line">Than you much willing to be counted wise</div>
                              <div class="line">In spending your wit in the praise of mine.</div>
                              <div class="line">But now to task the tasker: good Boyet,</div>
                              <div class="line">You are not ignorant, all-telling fame</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth noise abroad, Navarre hath made a vow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till painful study shall outwear three years,</div>
                              <div class="line">No woman may approach his silent court:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore to's seemeth it a needful course,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before we enter his forbidden gates,</div>
                              <div class="line">To know his pleasure; and in that behalf,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bold of your worthiness, we single you</div>
                              <div class="line">As our best-moving fair solicitor.</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell him, the daughter of the King of France,</div>
                              <div class="line">On serious business, craving quick dispatch,</div>
                              <div class="line">Importunes personal conference with his grace:</div>
                              <div class="line">Haste, signify so much; while we attend,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like humble-visaged suitors, his high will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Proud of employment, willingly I go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">All pride is willing pride, and yours is so.</div>
                              <p>Exit BOYET</p>
                              <div class="line">Who are the votaries, my loving lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">That are vow-fellows with this virtuous duke?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Longaville is one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you the man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know him, madam: at a marriage-feast,</div>
                              <div class="line">Between Lord Perigort and the beauteous heir</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Jaques Falconbridge, solemnized</div>
                              <div class="line">In Normandy, saw I this Longaville:</div>
                              <div class="line">A man of sovereign parts he is esteem'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Well fitted in arts, glorious in arms:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing becomes him ill that he would well.</div>
                              <div class="line">The only soil of his fair virtue's gloss,</div>
                              <div class="line">If virtue's gloss will stain with any soil,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is a sharp wit matched with too blunt a will;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose edge hath power to cut, whose will still wills</div>
                              <div class="line">It should none spare that come within his power.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Some merry mocking lord, belike; is't so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">They say so most that most his humours know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Such short-lived wits do wither as they grow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Who are the rest?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">The young Dumain, a well-accomplished youth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all that virtue love for virtue loved:</div>
                              <div class="line">Most power to do most harm, least knowing ill;</div>
                              <div class="line">For he hath wit to make an ill shape good,</div>
                              <div class="line">And shape to win grace though he had no wit.</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw him at the Duke Alencon's once;</div>
                              <div class="line">And much too little of that good I saw</div>
                              <div class="line">Is my report to his great worthiness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Another of these students at that time</div>
                              <div class="line">Was there with him, if I have heard a truth.</div>
                              <div class="line">Biron they call him; but a merrier man,</div>
                              <div class="line">Within the limit of becoming mirth,</div>
                              <div class="line">I never spent an hour's talk withal:</div>
                              <div class="line">His eye begets occasion for his wit;</div>
                              <div class="line">For every object that the one doth catch</div>
                              <div class="line">The other turns to a mirth-moving jest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which his fair tongue, conceit's expositor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Delivers in such apt and gracious words</div>
                              <div class="line">That aged ears play truant at his tales</div>
                              <div class="line">And younger hearings are quite ravished;</div>
                              <div class="line">So sweet and voluble is his discourse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">God bless my ladies! are they all in love,</div>
                              <div class="line">That every one her own hath garnished</div>
                              <div class="line">With such bedecking ornaments of praise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Boyet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BOYET</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, what admittance, lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Navarre had notice of your fair approach;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he and his competitors in oath</div>
                              <div class="line">Were all address'd to meet you, gentle lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before I came. Marry, thus much I have learnt:</div>
                              <div class="line">He rather means to lodge you in the field,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like one that comes here to besiege his court,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than seek a dispensation for his oath,</div>
                              <div class="line">To let you enter his unpeopled house.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Navarre.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FERDINAND, LONGAVILLE, DUMAIN, BIRON, and
Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair princess, welcome to the court of Navarre.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fair' I give you back again; and 'welcome' I have</div>
                              <div class="line">not yet: the roof of this court is too high to be</div>
                              <div class="line">yours; and welcome to the wide fields too base to be mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall be welcome, madam, to my court.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be welcome, then: conduct me thither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me, dear lady; I have sworn an oath.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Our Lady help my lord! he'll be forsworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Not for the world, fair madam, by my will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, will shall break it; will and nothing else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Your ladyship is ignorant what it is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Were my lord so, his ignorance were wise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where now his knowledge must prove ignorance.</div>
                              <div class="line">I hear your grace hath sworn out house-keeping:</div>
                              <div class="line">Tis deadly sin to keep that oath, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sin to break it.</div>
                              <div class="line">But pardon me. I am too sudden-bold:</div>
                              <div class="line">To teach a teacher ill beseemeth me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Vouchsafe to read the purpose of my coming,</div>
                              <div class="line">And suddenly resolve me in my suit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I will, if suddenly I may.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">You will the sooner, that I were away;</div>
                              <div class="line">For you'll prove perjured if you make me stay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not I dance with you in Brabant once?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not I dance with you in Brabant once?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">I know you did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
