                              <div class="line">You leer upon me, do you? there's an eye</div>
                              <div class="line">Wounds like a leaden sword.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Full merrily</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath this brave manage, this career, been run.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, he is tilting straight! Peace! I have done.</div>
                              <p>Enter COSTARD</p>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, pure wit! thou partest a fair fray.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir, they would know</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether the three Worthies shall come in or no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are there but three?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sir; but it is vara fine,</div>
                              <div class="line">For every one pursents three.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">And three times thrice is nine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so, sir; under correction, sir; I hope it is not so.</div>
                              <div class="line">You cannot beg us, sir, I can assure you, sir we know</div>
                              <div class="line">what we know:</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope, sir, three times thrice, sir,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not nine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Under correction, sir, we know whereuntil it doth amount.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">By Jove, I always took three threes for nine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir, it were pity you should get your living</div>
                              <div class="line">by reckoning, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">How much is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir, the parties themselves, the actors,</div>
                              <div class="line">sir, will show whereuntil it doth amount: for mine</div>
                              <div class="line">own part, I am, as they say, but to parfect one man</div>
                              <div class="line">in one poor man, Pompion the Great, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou one of the Worthies?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">It pleased them to think me worthy of Pompion the</div>
                              <div class="line">Great: for mine own part, I know not the degree of</div>
                              <div class="line">the Worthy, but I am to stand for him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, bid them prepare.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">We will turn it finely off, sir; we will take</div>
                              <div class="line">some care.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Biron, they will shame us: let them not approach.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">We are shame-proof, my lord: and tis some policy</div>
                              <div class="line">To have one show worse than the king's and his company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">I say they shall not come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, my good lord, let me o'errule you now:</div>
                              <div class="line">That sport best pleases that doth least know how:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where zeal strives to content, and the contents</div>
                              <div class="line">Dies in the zeal of that which it presents:</div>
                              <div class="line">Their form confounded makes most form in mirth,</div>
                              <div class="line">When great things labouring perish in their birth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">A right description of our sport, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Anointed, I implore so much expense of thy royal</div>
                              <div class="line">sweet breath as will utter a brace of words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Converses apart with FERDINAND, and delivers him a paper</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth this man serve God?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Why ask you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">He speaks not like a man of God's making.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">That is all one, my fair, sweet, honey monarch; for,</div>
                              <div class="line">I protest, the schoolmaster is exceeding</div>
                              <div class="line">fantastical; too, too vain, too too vain: but we</div>
                              <div class="line">will put it, as they say, to fortuna de la guerra.</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish you the peace of mind, most royal couplement!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is like to be a good presence of Worthies. He</div>
                              <div class="line">presents Hector of Troy; the swain, Pompey the</div>
                              <div class="line">Great; the parish curate, Alexander; Armado's page,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hercules; the pedant, Judas Maccabaeus: And if</div>
                              <div class="line">these four Worthies in their first show thrive,</div>
                              <div class="line">These four will change habits, and present the other five.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">There is five in the first show.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">You are deceived; 'tis not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">The pedant, the braggart, the hedge-priest, the fool</div>
                              <div class="line">and the boy:--</div>
                              <div class="line">Abate throw at novum, and the whole world again</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot pick out five such, take each one in his vein.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">The ship is under sail, and here she comes amain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter COSTARD, for Pompey</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I Pompey am,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">You lie, you are not he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I Pompey am,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">With libbard's head on knee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, old mocker: I must needs be friends</div>
                              <div class="line">with thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I Pompey am, Pompey surnamed the Big--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">The Great.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">It is, 'Great,' sir:--</div>
                              <div class="line">Pompey surnamed the Great;</div>
                              <div class="line">That oft in field, with targe and shield, did make</div>
                              <div class="line">my foe to sweat:</div>
                              <div class="line">And travelling along this coast, I here am come by chance,</div>
                              <div class="line">And lay my arms before the legs of this sweet lass of France,</div>
                              <div class="line">If your ladyship would say, 'Thanks, Pompey,' I had done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Great thanks, great Pompey.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not so much worth; but I hope I was perfect: I</div>
                              <div class="line">made a little fault in 'Great.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">My hat to a halfpenny, Pompey proves the best Worthy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR NATHANIEL, for Alexander</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR NATHANIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">When in the world I lived, I was the world's</div>
                              <div class="line">commander;</div>
                              <div class="line">By east, west, north, and south, I spread my</div>
                              <div class="line">conquering might:</div>
                              <div class="line">My scutcheon plain declares that I am Alisander,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Your nose says, no, you are not for it stands too right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Your nose smells 'no' in this, most tender-smelling knight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">The conqueror is dismay'd. Proceed, good Alexander.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR NATHANIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">When in the world I lived, I was the world's</div>
                              <div class="line">commander,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Most true, 'tis right; you were so, Alisander.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Pompey the Great,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Your servant, and Costard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Take away the conqueror, take away Alisander.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To SIR NATHANIEL</span>  O, sir, you have overthrown</div>
                              <div class="line">Alisander the conqueror! You will be scraped out of</div>
                              <div class="line">the painted cloth for this: your lion, that holds</div>
                              <div class="line">his poll-axe sitting on a close-stool, will be given</div>
                              <div class="line">to Ajax: he will be the ninth Worthy. A conqueror,</div>
                              <div class="line">and afeard to speak! run away for shame, Alisander.</div>
                              <p>SIR NATHANIEL retires</p>
                              <div class="line">There, an't shall please you; a foolish mild man; an</div>
                              <div class="line">honest man, look you, and soon dashed. He is a</div>
                              <div class="line">marvellous good neighbour, faith, and a very good</div>
                              <div class="line">bowler: but, for Alisander,--alas, you see how</div>
                              <div class="line">'tis,--a little o'erparted. But there are Worthies</div>
                              <div class="line">a-coming will speak their mind in some other sort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HOLOFERNES, for Judas; and MOTH, for Hercules</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">Great Hercules is presented by this imp,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose club kill'd Cerberus, that three-headed canis;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when he was a babe, a child, a shrimp,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus did he strangle serpents in his manus.</div>
                              <div class="line">Quoniam he seemeth in minority,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ergo I come with this apology.</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep some state in thy exit, and vanish.</div>
                              <p>MOTH retires</p>
                              <div class="line">Judas I am,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">A Judas!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">Not Iscariot, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">Judas I am, ycliped Maccabaeus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Judas Maccabaeus clipt is plain Judas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">A kissing traitor. How art thou proved Judas?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">Judas I am,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">The more shame for you, Judas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">What mean you, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">To make Judas hang himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">Begin, sir; you are my elder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well followed: Judas was hanged on an elder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not be put out of countenance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Because thou hast no face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">What is this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">A cittern-head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">The head of a bodkin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">A Death's face in a ring.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">The face of an old Roman coin, scarce seen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">The pommel of Caesar's falchion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">The carved-bone face on a flask.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Saint George's half-cheek in a brooch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and in a brooch of lead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and worn in the cap of a tooth-drawer.</div>
                              <div class="line">And now forward; for we have put thee in countenance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">You have put me out of countenance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">False; we have given thee faces.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">But you have out-faced them all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">An thou wert a lion, we would do so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, as he is an ass, let him go.</div>
                              <div class="line">And so adieu, sweet Jude! nay, why dost thou stay?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">For the latter end of his name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">For the ass to the Jude; give it him:--Jud-as, away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HOLOFERNES</div>
                              <div class="line">This is not generous, not gentle, not humble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">A light for Monsieur Judas! it grows dark, he may stumble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>HOLOFERNES retires</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor Maccabaeus, how hath he been baited!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO, for Hector</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Hide thy head, Achilles: here comes Hector in arms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Though my mocks come home by me, I will now be merry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector was but a Troyan in respect of this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">But is this Hector?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">I think Hector was not so clean-timbered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">His leg is too big for Hector's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">More calf, certain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">No; he is best endued in the small.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">This cannot be Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a god or a painter; for he makes faces.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">The armipotent Mars, of lances the almighty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Gave Hector a gift,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">A gilt nutmeg.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">A lemon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Stuck with cloves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">No, cloven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace!--</div>
                              <div class="line">The armipotent Mars, of lances the almighty</div>
                              <div class="line">Gave Hector a gift, the heir of Ilion;</div>
                              <div class="line">A man so breathed, that certain he would fight; yea</div>
                              <div class="line">From morn till night, out of his pavilion.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am that flower,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">That mint.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">That columbine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet Lord Longaville, rein thy tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I must rather give it the rein, for it runs against Hector.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and Hector's a greyhound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">The sweet war-man is dead and rotten; sweet chucks,</div>
                              <div class="line">beat not the bones of the buried: when he breathed,</div>
                              <div class="line">he was a man. But I will forward with my device.</div>
                              <p>To the PRINCESS</p>
                              <div class="line">Sweet royalty, bestow on me the sense of hearing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, brave Hector: we are much delighted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do adore thy sweet grace's slipper.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to DUMAIN</span>  Loves her by the foot,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to BOYET</span>  He may not by the yard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">This Hector far surmounted Hannibal,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">The party is gone, fellow Hector, she is gone; she</div>
                              <div class="line">is two months on her way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">What meanest thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, unless you play the honest Troyan, the poor</div>
                              <div class="line">wench is cast away: she's quick; the child brags in</div>
                              <div class="line">her belly already: tis yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou infamonize me among potentates? thou shalt</div>
                              <div class="line">die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Then shall Hector be whipped for Jaquenetta that is</div>
                              <div class="line">quick by him and hanged for Pompey that is dead by</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Most rare Pompey!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">Renowned Pompey!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Greater than great, great, great, great Pompey!</div>
                              <div class="line">Pompey the Huge!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector trembles.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Pompey is moved. More Ates, more Ates! stir them</div>
                              <div class="line">on! stir them on!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Hector will challenge him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, if a' have no man's blood in's belly than will</div>
                              <div class="line">sup a flea.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">By the north pole, I do challenge thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not fight with a pole, like a northern man:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll slash; I'll do it by the sword. I bepray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">let me borrow my arms again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Room for the incensed Worthies!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COSTARD</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll do it in my shirt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Most resolute Pompey!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, let me take you a buttonhole lower. Do you</div>
                              <div class="line">not see Pompey is uncasing for the combat? What mean</div>
                              <div class="line">you? You will lose your reputation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen and soldiers, pardon me; I will not combat</div>
                              <div class="line">in my shirt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">You may not deny it: Pompey hath made the challenge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet bloods, I both may and will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">What reason have you for't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">The naked truth of it is, I have no shirt; I go</div>
                              <div class="line">woolward for penance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOYET</div>
                              <div class="line">True, and it was enjoined him in Rome for want of</div>
                              <div class="line">linen: since when, I'll be sworn, he wore none but</div>
                              <div class="line">a dishclout of Jaquenetta's, and that a' wears next</div>
                              <div class="line">his heart for a favour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MERCADE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCADE</div>
                              <div class="line">God save you, madam!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, Mercade;</div>
                              <div class="line">But that thou interrupt'st our merriment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCADE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry, madam; for the news I bring</div>
                              <div class="line">Is heavy in my tongue. The king your father--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dead, for my life!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MERCADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Even so; my tale is told.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthies, away! the scene begins to cloud.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
                              <div class="line">For mine own part, I breathe free breath. I have</div>
                              <div class="line">seen the day of wrong through the little hole of</div>
                              <div class="line">discretion, and I will right myself like a soldier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Worthies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">How fares your majesty?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Boyet, prepare; I will away tonight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, not so; I do beseech you, stay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Prepare, I say. I thank you, gracious lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">For all your fair endeavors; and entreat,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of a new-sad soul, that you vouchsafe</div>
                              <div class="line">In your rich wisdom to excuse or hide</div>
                              <div class="line">The liberal opposition of our spirits,</div>
                              <div class="line">If over-boldly we have borne ourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">In the converse of breath: your gentleness</div>
                              <div class="line">Was guilty of it. Farewell worthy lord!</div>
                              <div class="line">A heavy heart bears not a nimble tongue:</div>
                              <div class="line">Excuse me so, coming too short of thanks</div>
                              <div class="line">For my great suit so easily obtain'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">The extreme parts of time extremely forms</div>
                              <div class="line">All causes to the purpose of his speed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And often at his very loose decides</div>
                              <div class="line">That which long process could not arbitrate:</div>
                              <div class="line">And though the mourning brow of progeny</div>
                              <div class="line">Forbid the smiling courtesy of love</div>
                              <div class="line">The holy suit which fain it would convince,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, since love's argument was first on foot,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let not the cloud of sorrow justle it</div>
                              <div class="line">From what it purposed; since, to wail friends lost</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not by much so wholesome-profitable</div>
                              <div class="line">As to rejoice at friends but newly found.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">I understand you not: my griefs are double.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest plain words best pierce the ear of grief;</div>
                              <div class="line">And by these badges understand the king.</div>
                              <div class="line">For your fair sakes have we neglected time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Play'd foul play with our oaths: your beauty, ladies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath much deform'd us, fashioning our humours</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to the opposed end of our intents:</div>
                              <div class="line">And what in us hath seem'd ridiculous,--</div>
                              <div class="line">As love is full of unbefitting strains,</div>
                              <div class="line">All wanton as a child, skipping and vain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Form'd by the eye and therefore, like the eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Full of strange shapes, of habits and of forms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Varying in subjects as the eye doth roll</div>
                              <div class="line">To every varied object in his glance:</div>
                              <div class="line">Which parti-coated presence of loose love</div>
                              <div class="line">Put on by us, if, in your heavenly eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have misbecomed our oaths and gravities,</div>
                              <div class="line">Those heavenly eyes, that look into these faults,</div>
                              <div class="line">Suggested us to make. Therefore, ladies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our love being yours, the error that love makes</div>
                              <div class="line">Is likewise yours: we to ourselves prove false,</div>
                              <div class="line">By being once false for ever to be true</div>
                              <div class="line">To those that make us both,--fair ladies, you:</div>
                              <div class="line">And even that falsehood, in itself a sin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus purifies itself and turns to grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">We have received your letters full of love;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your favours, the ambassadors of love;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in our maiden council, rated them</div>
                              <div class="line">At courtship, pleasant jest and courtesy,</div>
                              <div class="line">As bombast and as lining to the time:</div>
                              <div class="line">But more devout than this in our respects</div>
                              <div class="line">Have we not been; and therefore met your loves</div>
                              <div class="line">In their own fashion, like a merriment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Our letters, madam, show'd much more than jest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">So did our looks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                              <div class="line">We did not quote them so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, at the latest minute of the hour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grant us your loves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">A time, methinks, too short</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a world-without-end bargain in.</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, my lord, your grace is perjured much,</div>
                              <div class="line">Full of dear guiltiness; and therefore this:</div>
                              <div class="line">If for my love, as there is no such cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">You will do aught, this shall you do for me:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your oath I will not trust; but go with speed</div>
                              <div class="line">To some forlorn and naked hermitage,</div>
                              <div class="line">Remote from all the pleasures of the world;</div>
                              <div class="line">There stay until the twelve celestial signs</div>
                              <div class="line">Have brought about the annual reckoning.</div>
                              <div class="line">If this austere insociable life</div>
                              <div class="line">Change not your offer made in heat of blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">If frosts and fasts, hard lodging and thin weeds</div>
                              <div class="line">Nip not the gaudy blossoms of your love,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that it bear this trial and last love;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, at the expiration of the year,</div>
                              <div class="line">Come challenge me, challenge me by these deserts,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, by this virgin palm now kissing thine</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be thine; and till that instant shut</div>
                              <div class="line">My woeful self up in a mourning house,</div>
                              <div class="line">Raining the tears of lamentation</div>
                              <div class="line">For the remembrance of my father's death.</div>
                              <div class="line">If this thou do deny, let our hands part,</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither entitled in the other's heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">If this, or more than this, I would deny,</div>
                              <div class="line">To flatter up these powers of mine with rest,</div>
                              <div class="line">The sudden hand of death close up mine eye!</div>
                              <div class="line">Hence ever then my heart is in thy breast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">[And what to me, my love? and what to me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                              <div class="line">You must be purged too, your sins are rack'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">You are attaint with faults and perjury:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore if you my favour mean to get,</div>
                              <div class="line">A twelvemonth shall you spend, and never rest,</div>
                              <div class="line">But seek the weary beds of people sick.]</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">But what to me, my love? but what to me? A wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">A beard, fair health, and honesty;</div>
                              <div class="line">With three-fold love I wish you all these three.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">O, shall I say, I thank you, gentle wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so, my lord; a twelvemonth and a day</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll mark no words that smooth-faced wooers say:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come when the king doth to my lady come;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, if I have much love, I'll give you some.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUMAIN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll serve thee true and faithfully till then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet swear not, lest ye be forsworn again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">What says Maria?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">At the twelvemonth's end</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll change my black gown for a faithful friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LONGAVILLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll stay with patience; but the time is long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIA</div>
                              <div class="line">The liker you; few taller are so young.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Studies my lady? mistress, look on me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold the window of my heart, mine eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">What humble suit attends thy answer there:</div>
                              <div class="line">Impose some service on me for thy love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Oft have I heard of you, my Lord Biron,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before I saw you; and the world's large tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Proclaims you for a man replete with mocks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Full of comparisons and wounding flouts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which you on all estates will execute</div>
                              <div class="line">That lie within the mercy of your wit.</div>
                              <div class="line">To weed this wormwood from your fruitful brain,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therewithal to win me, if you please,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without the which I am not to be won,</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall this twelvemonth term from day to day</div>
                              <div class="line">Visit the speechless sick and still converse</div>
                              <div class="line">With groaning wretches; and your task shall be,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all the fierce endeavor of your wit</div>
                              <div class="line">To enforce the pained impotent to smile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">To move wild laughter in the throat of death?</div>
                              <div class="line">It cannot be; it is impossible:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mirth cannot move a soul in agony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALINE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, that's the way to choke a gibing spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose influence is begot of that loose grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Which shallow laughing hearers give to fools:</div>
                              <div class="line">A jest's prosperity lies in the ear</div>
                              <div class="line">Of him that hears it, never in the tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Of him that makes it: then, if sickly ears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Deaf'd with the clamours of their own dear groans,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will hear your idle scorns, continue then,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will have you and that fault withal;</div>
                              <div class="line">But if they will not, throw away that spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I shall find you empty of that fault,</div>
                              <div class="line">Right joyful of your reformation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">A twelvemonth! well; befall what will befall,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll jest a twelvemonth in an hospital.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PRINCESS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To FERDINAND</span>  Ay, sweet my lord; and so I take my leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">No, madam; we will bring you on your way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">Our wooing doth not end like an old play;</div>
                              <div class="line">Jack hath not Jill: these ladies' courtesy</div>
                              <div class="line">Might well have made our sport a comedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir, it wants a twelvemonth and a day,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then 'twill end.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIRON</div>
                              <div class="line">That's too long for a play.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO</div>
